resources.string: Sign in to AppGallery Connect and click App analytics. Click an app, go to the Distribution analysis page, and choose Finance report.
By accessing the menus under Finance report, you can check the global financial data of your app, including the revenue, purchaser statistics, conversion rate, and subscription.

• View data by currency (CNY, USD, or EUR)

 • View the total revenue, Average Revenue Per Paying User (ARPPU) of the past 30 days, and average value per transaction for your app.

 • View revenue data of last day, last 7 days, or later 30 days.

 • On the Buyers list, you can view buyer data of the last day, last 7 days, or later 30 days.

• View data by one or more countries/regions, currency(CNY, USD, or EUR),or time period (last day, last 7 days, last 30 days, or all time).

 • View transaction data of the top 10 products in your app on the Revenue(by product) list, including the revenue, number of orders, refund, partial refund, and estimated annual revenue

 • View the revenue trend curve of the app in the last seven days on the revenue trend chart.

 • View statistics on the events that users obtain preferences at the bottom of the page, including Free products and Coupons.
The page provides buyer and ARPPU data.

• View data by one or more countries/regions or time period (last day, last 7 days, last 30 days, or all time).

 • View the statistics of all buyers, new buyers, and returning buyers in the last day, last seven days, and last 30 days. The All tab page also displays accumulated data.

 • View the user quantity and MoM growth rate of the top 10 products in your app on the Buyers statistics by product tab page.

• View data by one or more countries/regions or currency (CNY, USD, or EUR).\n\n • View the average number of times that a user pays and average payment amount of a user in your app in each month on the Payment conversion rate list.

• View data by one or more countries/regions, currency (CNY, USD, or EUR), or time period (last day, last 7 days, last 30 days, or all time).

 • View the operation data of the top 10 subscription items in an app from the Subscription report list.

 • View the trend of the total number of subscriptions of the app in the last seven days.

 • View the total subscription revenue trend of the app in the last seven days.

 • View order quantities of the top 3 subscription items.

 • View statistics of new subscription sources of this month, including subscription items and the percentage of new subscriptions in the current month.

The Notification details report provides the statistical graphs and details of major indicators such as Sent times, Delivered times, Tapped times, and Undelivered notification details, and supports report download.
Sign in to AppGallery Connect and click App analytics. Click an app, go to the Operation analysis page, and choose Notification details.
Notification Details
This report provides the statistical graphs and details of major indicators such as Daily active users, Daily new users, Monthly active users, and Total users, and supports report download.
Sign in to AppGallery Connect and click App analytics. Click an app, go to the Operation Analysis page, and select the User details report.
User Details
